description: Number of rotationally symmetric closed meanders of length 4n+2.
comments: Closed meanders of other lengths do not have rotational symmetry. - _Andrew Howroyd_, Nov 24 2015See A077460 for additional information on the symmetries of closed meanders.
links: Andrew Howroyd, Illustration of a(1) and a(2)
crossrefs: Meander sequences in Bacher's paper: A060066, A060089, A060111, A060148, A060149, A060174, A060198.
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_, Apr 10 2001
